scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build-assessments && npm run copy-assessments
scripts.build-assessments: concurrently "npm run build -w packages/assessment-symbol-search-wearit" "npm run build -w packages/assessment-color-dots-wearit" "npm run build -w packages/assessment-grid-memory-wearit" "npm run build -w packages/assessment-color-shapes-wearit"
scripts.copy-assessments: cpy packages/assessment-symbol-search-wearit/dist/** dist/assessments/symbol-search && cpy packages/assessment-color-dots-wearit/dist/** dist/assessments/color-dots && cpy packages/assessment-grid-memory-wearit/dist/** dist/assessments/grid-memory && cpy packages/assessment-color-shapes-wearit/dist/** dist/assessments/color-shapes
